title: Did Bayden temporarily freeze Trump's base to reduce insulin, Eiben's prices?
subtitle: In the first week of his work, President Joe Biden issued more than a dozen executive orders.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: In the early days of his term in 2021, United States President Joe Biden temporarily froze a federal base initiated by former President Donald Trump with the aim of lowering the prices of insulin and EpiPen.
